thread.title: Clinton aide Huma Abedin testifies before Benghazi committee
thread.title_full: Clinton aide Huma Abedin testifies before Benghazi committee

title: Clinton aide Huma Abedin testifies before Benghazi committee
text:
> Top News Clinton aide Huma Abedin testifies before Benghazi committee Huma Abedin, a close aide to Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, arrives on Capitol Hill in Washington, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, to testify before a closed-door hearing of the House Benghazi Committee investigating the deadly attacks in Benghazi, Libya. (AP Photo/Jacquelyn Martin) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
